channel.title: Accessing console
channel.description:
SOLVED
I have gone to options->keyboard->advanced and ticked "Enable developer console". However pressing '~' (SHIFT + #) does not open the console.
I am trying to enable my Xbox 360 controller for use with the game using DarknessDudeTOB's cfg files that I found here: [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12924[/url].
I have done everything required except running the exec command, but I can't access the console to do so.
Any help appreciated!
coh1985
